tweet: We're on TV and online right now, and the second half-hour will be exclusively online. Hope you can join us for this important discussion. https://t.co/qsnU3aEMU8

https://t.co/4nSVeFV5p3

SOO LOCKS FUNDING MOVES FORWARD: Today, the Appropriations Committee passed legislation with $75.3 million for building a new lock at the Soo Locks. This has been a top priority of my work on the committee and it funds the construction of a new lock for the first time in decades! https://t.co/ciA9M1WLT4

More good news for Michigan today. In its bill for next year, the House Appropriations Committee is fully funding the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative. This meets the level President Trump supported after meeting with me, @RepHuizenga and @RepJackBergman on March 28. https://t.co/DUs1HXM5RR

It's been outstanding to work with @RepJackBergman on this important project for our state. I know we've been talking to our colleagues and working hard to make sure this funding, as requested by @POTUS, is included. This is a big step forward. https://t.co/FkaoMTvO7J
